name: Bike racing - Bike games - Motocycle racing games
name_original: Bike racing - Bike games - Motocycle racing games
description:
If you are a fan of motor bike racing games then this is a great choice for you. Motor bike racing game will bring you the ultimate experience.
The game is completely 3D will give you the feeling of realism like reality. But be careful, the game is not careful for those who are weak. Please consider before joining the game
Features of the game:
- Many moto bike for you to choose from
- Speed up with just 1 touch
- Destroy opponents with your weapons
- Completely free for everyone
Download and experience the game now!
